info.title: Tummy Time API
info.description: API documentation for the Tummy Time project

post.description: Authenticates a user with email and password, and returns an access token.
Invalidates the current user's access token, effectively logging them out.

get.summary: Get a paginated list of all categories
get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all categories. Accessible by any authenticated user.

post.description: Creates a new category. Requires super admin privileges.

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to create a category.

422.description: Validation Error: Invalid input for allowed fields.

items.example: The name has already been taken.

get.description: Retrieves the details of a specific category by its ID. Accessible by any authenticated user.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the category to retrieve

delete.description: Deletes a category by its ID. Requires super admin privileges.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the category to delete

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to delete this category.

get.summary: Get a paginated list of all food items
get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all food items. Accessible by any authenticated user.

post.description: Creates a new food item. Requires super admin privileges.

description.example: A classic Indian rice dish with spicy chicken.

image_url.description: URL of the food item's image.

description.example: A classic Indian rice dish with spicy chicken.

image_url.description: Image file for the food item.

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to create a food item.

get.description: Retrieves the details of a specific food item by its ID. Accessible by any authenticated user.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the food item to retrieve

delete.description: Deletes a food item by its ID. Requires super admin privileges.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the food item to delete

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to delete a food item.

patch.description: Updates the details of an existing food item. Requires super admin privileges. Note: A POST request is used here with 'multipart/form-data' to handle both fields and file uploads.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the food item to update

image_url.description: URL of the new image, or 'null' to remove.
New image file for the food item. Send 'null' to delete the existing image.

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to update a food item.

get.summary: Get all cart items for a specific user
get.description: Retrieves all cart items for a user by their ID. Requires the authenticated user to be the owner of the cart.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: ID of the user whose cart items to retrieve

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to access this cart.

delete.summary: Delete all items from a user's cart
delete.description: Removes all cart items from a specific cart by its ID. Requires the authenticated user to be the cart owner.

parameters.name: cart_id
parameters.description: ID of the cart to clear

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to delete this cart.

patch.description: Replaces all existing cart items with a new list. This acts as a full cart replacement. Requires the authenticated user to be the cart owner.

parameters.name: cart_id
parameters.description: ID of the cart to update

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to update this cart.

get.summary: Get a paginated list of all users
get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all registered users. Requires admin privileges.

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to view all users.

post.description:
Registers a new user. Sensitive fields like 'is_staff' and 'is_active'
     * cannot be set by the client for this endpoint.

requestBody.description: User registration data. Can be JSON or Multipart Form Data.

403.description: Forbidden: Unauthorized key (e.g., is_staff, is_active, role) provided by client.

422.description: Validation Error: Invalid input for allowed fields.

email: The email is already in use.
password: The password confirmation does not match.

get.summary: Get user details by ID or slug
get.description: Retrieves the details of a specific user by their ID or slug. A user can view their own profile, or an admin can view any user's profile. Includes portfolio links if the user is a 'provider'.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: ID or slug of the user to retrieve

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to view this user.

delete.description: Deletes a user by their ID or slug. A user can delete their own account, or an admin can delete any user's account.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: ID or slug of the user to delete

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to delete this user.

patch.description:
Updates the details of an existing user. A user can update their own profile, or a super admin can update any user's profile.
     * Sensitive fields like 'is_staff', 'is_active', and 'role' are ignored/discarded if sent in the request body, and 'password' is handled separately for updates.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: ID or slug of the user to update

requestBody.description: User data to update. Can be JSON or Multipart Form Data.

403.description: Forbidden: You are not authorized to update this user.

422.description: Validation Error: Invalid input for allowed fields.

email: The email is already in use.
username: The username is already taken by another user.

post.description:
Registers a new user and sets 'is_staff' to true. Requires super admin privileges for the authenticated user. 
     * Sensitive fields like 'is_active' and 'role' ('staff') cannot be set by the client for this endpoint.

requestBody.description: Admin user registration data. Can be JSON or Multipart Form Data.

403.description: Forbidden: Unauthorized key (e.g., is_active, incorrect role) provided, or authenticated user lacks privileges to create an an admin.

422.description: Validation Error: Invalid input for allowed fields.

email: The email is already in use.
password: The password confirmation does not match.

is_available.description: Availability status of the food item

image_url.description: URL of the food item's image

example.name: Burger
example.description: A delicious beef patty with lettuce and tomatoes.

food_id.description: ID of the associated food item

UpdateCartItemRequest.title: UpdateCartItemRequest
UpdateCartItemRequest.description: Request body for updating cart items

cart_id.description: ID of the cart to update

is_staff.description: Indicates if the user has admin privileges

is_active.description: Indicates if the user account is active

ErrorResponse.title: Error Response
ErrorResponse.description: Standard error response format for generic errors (e.g., 401, 403, 404, 500)
